definition: to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
Zhumadian prefecture level city in Henan
to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
Zhumadian prefecture level city in Henan
to keep stationed (of troops)/to remain as a garrison

sentences.english: Chinese Ambassador to Russia Li Hui also greeted Hu at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐俄羅斯大使李輝也到機場迎接。

sentences.english: Circumstances, we come to the connection of the South Korean journalists stationed Zhang Ling.
sentences.chinese: 具體情況，我們來連線本臺駐韓國記者張玲。

sentences.english: H.E. Mr. Yang Youming, Chinese Ambassador to Trinidad and Tobago, and his wife Mrs. Geng Hailing were present.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐特多大使楊優明和夫人耿海凌出席。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 許可證持有人須爲駐工地建築工人提供流動洗手間。

sentences.english: The BBC's correspondent in Seoul is John Sudworth.
sentences.chinese: BBC駐首爾記者約翰薩德沃思發來的報道。

sentences.english: Eikenberry was in fact the commander of the Combined Forces Command Afghanistan (CFC-A).
sentences.chinese: 艾肯伯裏實際上是駐阿富汗聯軍司令部司令官。

sentences.english: Who first fired on the American-Afghan force?
sentences.chinese: 是誰首先向駐阿富汗的美國部隊開火？

sentences.english: Yasuhisa Kawamura is Japan's deputy consul general in New York.
sentences.chinese: 川村泰久是日本駐紐約副總領事。

sentences.english: Welcome to the open house of the Chinese Mission.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎大家出席中國駐歐盟使團的“開放日”活動。

sentences.english: Among those killed was the top U.N. official in Iraq - Sergio Vieira de Mello.
sentences.chinese: 喪生的人員中包括聯合國駐巴格達最高官員德梅洛。

sentences.english: Our newspaper has an old-timey correspondent in New York.
sentences.chinese: 本報在紐約駐有一位資深通訊記者。

sentences.english: The Gourmet Week is hosted by SAS Hotel and co-sponsored by the Chinese embassy in Latvia .
sentences.chinese: 美食周由薩斯飯店主辦，中國駐拉脫維亞大使館協辦。

sentences.english: The red flag is flying high in the Chinese Embassy in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐蘇丹大使館，五星紅旗高高飄揚。

sentences.english: The united nations maintains a military presence in the area .
sentences.chinese: 聯合國在該地區駐有軍隊。

sentences.english: The Norwegian Foreign Ministry summoned Iran's envoy (charge d'affaires) in Oslo to protest the action.
sentences.chinese: 挪威外交部召見伊朗駐奧斯陸外交官提出抗議。

sentences.english: The eight trucks were transporting supplies to Nato forces in Afghanistan Photograph: Mian Khursheed/Reuters
sentences.chinese: 這是八輛爲北約駐阿富汗部隊運送物資的卡車。

definition: to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
